hints.content:
Perpendicular lines meet at right angles.  


[[☃ explanation 1]]

Now, let's look at all of the possible ways to connect the black points in the figure. 


[[☃ image 1]]

Which of these is perpendicular to the dashed line segment?

The answer



[[☃ image 1]]

question.content:
Any pair of points can be connected by a line.

**Connect the pair of black points that makes a line perpendicular to the dashed line segment.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

hints.content:
Parallel lines are always the same distance apart from each other — no matter how far they are extended, they will never meet.  

[[☃ explanation 1]]
